original_text: On the third day of the journey, Abraham could see the place. It was not very far away.
korean_text: 제삼일에 아브라함이 눈을 들어 그 곳을 멀리 바라본지라

sentences.original_text: On the third day of the journey

sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함이 그 장소를 볼 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: It was not very far away
